Class AlbumsFragment.AlbumListAdapter.ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • eu.tivian.musico.ui.AlbumsFragment.AlbumListAdapter.ViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View.OnClickListener
    Enclosing class:
    AlbumsFragment.AlbumListAdapter

    private class AlbumsFragment.AlbumListAdapter.ViewHolder
extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements View.OnClickListener
    The view holder for the RecyclerView.Adapter.
